name: Web3.js
desc: Web3.js is a collection of libraries that allow you to interact with a local or remote ethereum node using HTTP, IPC or WebSocket.

name: Ethers.js
desc: The ethers.js is a simple, compact and complete library for all your Ethereum needs.

name: Polkadot.js
desc: Polkadot.js is an effort to provide a collection of tools, utilities and libraries for interacting with the Polkadot network from JavaScript.

name: Solidity
desc: Solidity is an object-oriented, high-level language for implementing smart contracts. Smart contracts are programs that govern the behavior of accounts within the Ethereum state.

name: Metamask
desc: MetaMask is the leading self-custodial wallet. The safe and simple way to access blockchain applications and web3. Trusted by millions of users worldwide.

name: Hardhat
desc: Hardhat is a development environment for Ethereum software, for editing, compiling, debugging and deploying your smart contracts and dApps.

name: Nodejs
desc: Node.js is an open-source, cross-platform JavaScript runtime environment.

name: React
desc: The library for web and native user interfaces

name: Javascript
desc: JavaScript (JS) is a lightweight, interpreted, or just-in-time compiled programming language . While it is most well-known as the scripting language for Web pages, many non-browser environments also use it.

name: Css3
desc: CSS describes how HTML elements should be displayed.CSS3 adds several new styling features and improvements to enhance the web presentation capabilities.

name: HTML5
desc: HTML5 is a markup language used for structuring and presenting content on the World Wide Web. It is the fifth and final major HTML version that is a World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) recommendation.

name: Typescript
desc: TypeScript is a strongly typed programming language that builds on JavaScript, giving you better tooling at any scale.

name: Sass
desc: CSS with superpowers. Sass is the most mature, stable, and powerful professional grade CSS extension language in the world.

name: Github actions
desc: GitHub Actions  build, test, and deploy your code right from GitHub. Make code reviews, branch management, and issue triaging work the way you want.

name: The graph
desc: The Graph is an indexing protocol for organizing blockchain data and making it easily accessible with GraphQL.
